name: Super Sonic Space Battles
description:
A game originally built in a 48 hour game jam at Northampton University.

It's a turn based strategy game where players can mod their ship and fight other randomly generated ships to defeat each planet in the solar system, and then the final boss.

Developed by Christopher Deane, Luke Merritt, Owen Plant, Kelvin Avey and Dylan Carpenter

Dylan Carpenter's Tumbler https://cafevampire-art.tumblr.com

Kelvin Avey's Portfolio https://theartofkelvinavey.weebly.com

Owen Plant's Portfolio https://owenplantart.artstation.com

Luke Merritt's Twitter https://twitter.com/FV_Studio_UK?lang=en

Christopher Deane's Twitter https://twitter.com/cd_gamesdev
